mapper.sql: id, visitor_id, interviewee_id, visit_path, read_status, create_time, modify_time, create_man, modify_man, remark
mapper.select:
SELECT DATE_FORMAT( cv.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i' ) AS visitTime, cus.nick_name AS nickName, cus.sex AS sex, cus.customer_level AS customerLevel, ( YEAR ( NOW( ) ) - YEAR ( cus.birthday ) ) AS age, cus.head_portrait_url AS headPortraitUrl FROM customer_visit cv INNER JOIN customer cus ON cv.visitor_id = cus.customer_id WHERE cv.create_time BETWEEN #{before} and #{now} AND cv.interviewee_id = #{customerId} ORDER BY cv.create_time DESC
limit start,size
mapper.insert: insert into customer_visit (id, visitor_id, interviewee_id, visit_path, read_status, create_time, modify_time, create_man, modify_man, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{visitorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{intervieweeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{visitPath,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{readStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into customer_visit
id,
visitor_id,
interviewee_id,
visit_path,
read_status,
create_time,
modify_time,
create_man,
modify_man,
remark,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{visitorId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{intervieweeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

mapper.update:
update customer_visit
visitor_id = #{visitorId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
interviewee_id = #{intervieweeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
visit_path = #{visitPath,jdbcType=TINYINT},
read_status = #{readStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_man = #{createMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_man = #{modifyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update customer_visit set read_status = 1 where create_time < #{now} and interviewee_id = #{customerId}

update customer_visit set visitor_id = #{visitorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, interviewee_id = #{intervieweeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, visit_path = #{visitPath,jdbcType=TINYINT}, read_status = #{readStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_man = #{createMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_man = #{modifyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
